titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3090) to provide tax incentives for economic recovery.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-252, by Mr. Linder.
The amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against the bill, as amended, are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 87.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 270.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 400).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 199 (Roll no. 401).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/23/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3090 (providing tax incentives for economic recovery).
